titleStmt.title: At Edinburgh, the third day of September, one thousand six hundred seventy and four years. The lords of His Majesties Privy council taking to their consideration, that the work which the magistrates of Edinburgh have undertaken, and are presently about, in conveying and bringing in vvater to the said burgh, by leaden-pypes and conduits, ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

titleStmt.title: At Edinburgh, the third day of September, one thousand six hundred seventy and four years. The lords of His Majesties Privy council taking to their consideration, that the work which the magistrates of Edinburgh have undertaken, and are presently about, in conveying and bringing in vvater to the said burgh, by leaden-pypes and conduits, ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed: Al. Gibson Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Forbids anyone to molest the conduits being installed to bring water to Edinburgh.
Imprefect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
